metadata.title: CVE-2019-8769 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue existed in the drawing of web page elements. The issue wasaddressed with improved logic. This issue is fixed in iOS 13.1 and iPadOS13.1, macOS Catalina 10.15. Visiting a maliciously crafted website mayreveal browsing history.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8769` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.1-3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
